body_html:
Hi,
I've tried to run my demo application (https://github.com/szaza/tensorflow-java-yolo) with GPU on Linux Mint 18 with Nvidia Geforce 940MX, CUDA/CUDNN version 9.0, TensorFlow version 1.6, however I could run only on CPU until now. Theoretically, it is enough to include the libtensorflow_jni_gpu as dependency instead of libtensorflow.
I'm still trying to get it work.
Best regards,
Zoltan

body:
Hi,
I've tried to run my demo application (https://github.com/szaza/tensorflow-java-yolo) with GPU on Linux Mint 18 with Nvidia Geforce 940MX, CUDA/CUDNN version 9.0, TensorFlow version 1.6, however I could run only on CPU until now. Theoretically, it is enough to include the `libtensorflow_jni_gpu` as dependency instead of `libtensorflow`. 
I'm still trying to get it work.
Best regards,
   Zoltan
